narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Emma Ortega is a Counselor provider based in Los Lunas, NM. From 2018-01 through 2019-05, this provider received $261K in Medicaid payments across 3K claims serving 1K beneficiaries, billing 3 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: 92% of all billing comes from a single procedure code: 90837 (90837). This extreme concentration is unusual and may indicate specialized services or a narrow billing pattern.
Billing stopped in 2019-05, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.
